summary: A group of Australians are nominated for the Australian of the Year Award.
cast: Chris Lilley|Jennifer Byrne|Mick Graham|Chung Jade Koh|Maria Angelico|Emma Clapham|Adrienne Couper Smith|Deborah Jones|Taylor Potter|Tracey Mathers|Woody Miles|Frieda McKenna|Carol Chong|Ferdinand Hoang|Pixie Jones|Nyathan Hoth Mai|Jhyll Teplin|Lise Rodgers|Steven Abdilla|Bill Lee|Mariel Wong|Louis Corbett|Cathy Freeman|Vince Colosimo|Jane Hopkins|Gayle DeLosa|Jess Young|Ethan Thoi|Jack Charles|Corleen Cooper|Adam Ford|Nicole Brady|Cara Foley|Jamie Collins|Julia Collins|Andrew Walker|Rueben Heenan|Donald Baigent|Zac Jardine|Katie Collins|Peter Hearne|Genevieve Moore|Jill Singer|Sancia Robinson
title: We Can Be Heroes
